dialog.title: Submission Batch

param.name: @DROPBOXNAME
param.label: Ready to submit data from Dropbox:

dialog.p: If this is not the intended dropbox, please switch to the correct dropbox.
If you have general occupational, task, or exposure information (e.g. bluejean sandblaster, underground gold miner, asbestos worker, etc.) related to this group of images please enter it here:
If you have additional clinical information for any of the images being submitted, please submit Clinical Data Forms, available on the Dropbox main menu.

param.name: @CLINICALINFO
param.label: Will you be submitting additional information (yes/no):
